quotes.quote: For every minute you are angry, you lose 60 seconds of happiness.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Anger, resentment, and jealousy don't change the heart of others; they only change yours.
quotes.author: Shannon L. Alder

quotes.quote: Speak when you are angry, and you will make the best speech you will ever regret.

quotes.quote: Anger is an acid that can do more harm to the vessel in which it is stored than to anything on which it is poured.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: In a controversy, the instant we feel anger, we have already ceased striving for the truth and have begun striving for ourselves.

quotes.quote: Death is not the greatest loss in life. The greatest loss is what dies inside us while we live.
quotes.author: Norman Cousins

quotes.quote: Death leaves a heartache no one can heal, love leaves a memory no one can steal.

quotes.quote: The fear of death follows from the fear of life. A man who lives fully is prepared to die at any time.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: The death of a beloved is an amputation.
quotes.author: C. S. Lewis

quotes.quote: To live in hearts we leave behind is not to die.

quotes.quote: Death is not extinguishing the light; it is only putting out the lamp because the dawn has come.

quotes.quote: For life and death are one, even as the river and the sea are one.

quotes.quote: Friendship is born at that moment when one person says to another, 'What! You too? I thought I was the only one.'
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.quote: A true friend is someone who is always there for you, through the ups and downs.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Friendship is the only cement that will ever hold the world together.
quotes.author: Woodrow Wilson

quotes.quote: A friend is someone who knows all about you and still loves you.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.quote: A real friend is one who walks in when the rest of the world walks out.
quotes.author: Walter Winchell

quotes.quote: Friendship is not about whom you have known the longest, but who came and never left your side.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: A friend is someone who gives you total freedom to be yourself.
quotes.author: Jim Morrison

quotes.quote: True friendship comes when the silence between two people is comfortable.
quotes.author: David Tyson

quotes.quote: A true friend is the greatest of all blessings and the one that we take the least thought to acquire.
quotes.author: François de La Rochefoucauld

quotes.quote: A friend is one that knows you as you are, understands where you have been, accepts what you have become, and still, gently allows you to grow.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: A true friend is someone who is always there for you, with no ulterior motives.
quotes.author: Amy Li

quotes.quote: Friendship is like a rainbow between two hearts.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: A friend is someone who knows the song in your heart and can sing it back to you when you have forgotten the words.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Friendship is the only flower that blooms in all seasons.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: A true friend is someone who sees the pain in your eyes while everyone else believes the smile on your face.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: A friend is one who believes in you when you have ceased to believe in yourself.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Friendship is the golden thread that ties the hearts of all the world.
quotes.author: John Evelyn

quotes.quote: A true friend is someone who is always there, even in the darkest times.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Friendship is the only ship that never sinks.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: A friend is one of the nicest things you can have and one of the best things you can be.
quotes.author: Douglas Pagels

quotes.quote: Friendship isn't about whom you have known the longest. It's about who came and never left your side.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Friendship is a strong and habitual inclination in two persons to promote the good and happiness of one another.
quotes.author: Eustace Budgell

quotes.quote: A true friend is someone who is always there, not just for a day or a week, but for a lifetime.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: A friend is one who knows you and loves you just the same.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.quote: Friendship is the comfort of knowing that even when you feel alone, you are not.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: A friend is one who strengthens you with prayers, blesses you with love, and encourages you with hope.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Friendship is the only cure for hatred, the only guarantee of peace.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.quote: A true friend is someone who understands your past, believes in your future, and accepts you just the way you are.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: A friend is someone who can see the truth and pain in you even when you are fooling everyone else.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Friendship is the sweetest form of love.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: A true friend is someone who is always honest, even if the truth hurts.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Friendship is not about being inseparable but about being separated and knowing nothing will change.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: A friend is someone who makes your problems their problems, just so you don't have to face them alone.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Love is not about how many days, months, or years you have been together. It is about how much you love each other every single day.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Love is composed of a single soul inhabiting two bodies.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: The best thing to hold onto in life is each other.
quotes.author: Audrey Hepburn

quotes.quote: Love is when the other person's happiness is more important than your own.
quotes.author: H. Jackson Brown Jr.

quotes.quote: I saw that you were perfect, and so I loved you. Then I saw that you were not perfect and I loved you even more.
quotes.author: Angelita Lim

quotes.quote: In all the world, there is no heart for me like yours. In all the world, there is no love for you like mine.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: If I know what love is, it is because of you.
quotes.author: Hermann Hesse

quotes.quote: Love is a friendship set to music.
quotes.author: Joseph Campbell

quotes.quote: The best and most beautiful things in this world cannot be seen or even heard, but must be felt with the heart.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: Love is like the wind, you can't see it but you can feel it.
quotes.author: Nicholas Sparks

quotes.quote: The greatest happiness of life is the conviction that we are loved; loved for ourselves, or rather, loved in spite of ourselves.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: Love recognizes no barriers. It jumps hurdles, leaps fences, penetrates walls to arrive at its destination full of hope.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: Love is the ultimate expression of the will to live.
quotes.author: Tom Wolfe

quotes.quote: Love is the bridge between two hearts.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: I love you not only for what you are, but for what I am when I am with you.
quotes.author: Roy Croft

quotes.quote: Love is when you look into someone's eyes and see everything you need.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Love is the master key that opens the gates of happiness.
quotes.author: Oliver Wendell Holmes Sr.

quotes.quote: Love is the greatest refreshment in life.
quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

quotes.quote: To love someone deeply gives you strength. Being loved by someone deeply gives you courage.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: Love is an irresistible desire to be irresistibly desired.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.quote: Love is the only force capable of transforming an enemy into a friend.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quotes.quote: Love is a game that two can play and both win.
quotes.author: Eva Gabor

quotes.quote: Love is when the soul starts to sing and the flowers of your life bloom on their own.
quotes.author: Rabindranath Tagore

quotes.quote: Love is a canvas furnished by nature and embroidered by imagination.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.quote: Love is the only gold.
quotes.author: Alfred Lord Tennyson

quotes.quote: Love is like a virus. It can happen to anybody at any time.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: Love is the beauty of the soul.
quotes.author: Saint Augustine

quotes.quote: Love is the triumph of imagination over intelligence.
quotes.author: H. L. Mencken

quotes.quote: Love is the magician that pulls man out of his own hat.
quotes.author: Ben Hecht

quotes.quote: Love is an endless act of forgiveness. Forgiveness is the key to action and freedom.
quotes.author: Byron Katie

quotes.quote: Divorce isn't the child's fault. Don't say anything unkind about your ex to the child, because you're really just hurting the child.
quotes.author: Valerie Bertinelli

quotes.quote: Divorce is the one human tragedy that reduces everything to cash.
quotes.author: Rita Mae Brown

quotes.quote: Sometimes divorce is the best thing that can happen to marriage.
quotes.author: Mary Jo Eustace

quotes.quote: Divorce is a fire exit. When a house is burning, it doesn't matter who set the fire. If there is no fire exit, everyone in the house will be burned!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat Ildan

quotes.quote: Divorce is the one argument that forever keeps cropping up, like the mushrooms on a lawn after the rain.
quotes.author: J. B. Priestley

quotes.quote: Divorce is the one true human tragedy.
quotes.author: Oliver Goldsmith

quotes.quote: Divorce is a declaration of independence with only two signers.
quotes.author: Gerald F. Lieberman

quotes.quote: Divorce is a time of change. It really rocks a foundation of most people's lives. When we have our heart broken or our dreams taken away from us, it is a time of growth and change.
quotes.author: Debbie Ford

quotes.quote: Divorce is a journey. It is a roller coaster ride of emotions that we never thought we would have to experience.
quotes.author: Sara C. Medina

quotes.quote: Divorce is not the end of the world. It's the end of a relationship, but it's not the end of love. It's the end of something old, but it's the beginning of something new.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Divorce is a time of change. It's a time to redefine yourself, to rediscover what makes you happy.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Divorce is not the end. It's the beginning of a new chapter filled with opportunity if you allow yourself to see it that way.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Divorce is a journey. It's a painful process, but with time and healing, it can also be a transformative and empowering experience.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Divorce is not the end of your story. It is the end of a chapter, but it's up to you to turn the page and start a new chapter filled with hope and possibility.

quotes.quote: Divorce is not a sign of failure. It's a sign that you had the courage to walk away from something that wasn't right for you.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Divorce is a painful process, but it's also an opportunity for growth and self-discovery. Use this time to rediscover who you are and what you want out of life.

quotes.quote: Falling in love is like getting hit by a truck and yet not being mortally wounded. Just sick to your stomach, high one minute, low the next. Starving hungry but unable to eat. Hot, cold, forever horny, full of hope and enthusiasm, with momentary depressions that wipe you out.
quotes.author: Jackie Collins

quotes.quote: Falling in love is not a choice. To stay in love is.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Falling in love is a wonderfully terrifying sensation.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: Falling in love is easy, staying in love requires work.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Falling in love is like jumping off a really tall building. Your brain tells you it is not a good idea, but your heart tells you, you can fly.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Falling in love is like holding a candle. Initially, it lightens up the world around you. Then it starts melting and hurt you. Finally, it goes off and everything is darker than ever and all you are left with is the.. BURN!
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Falling in love is easy. Falling in love with the same person repeatedly is extraordinary.
quotes.author: Crystal Woods

quotes.quote: Falling in love is like leaping from a cliff. Your brain screams that it's not a good idea and that hurt and pain will inevitably come to you. But your heart believes you can soar, glide and fly.

quotes.quote: Falling in love is like getting hit by a truck and yet not being mortally wounded. Just sick to your stomach, high one minute, low the next. Starving hungry but unable to eat. Hot, cold, forever horny, full of hope and enthusiasm, with momentary depressions that wipe you out.

quotes.quote: Falling in love is not a choice. To stay in love is.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Falling in love is a wonderfully terrifying sensation.

quotes.quote: Falling in love is easy, staying in love requires work.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Falling in love is like jumping off a really tall building. Your brain tells you it is not a good idea, but your heart tells you, you can fly.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Falling in love is like holding a candle. Initially, it lightens up the world around you. Then it starts melting and hurt you. Finally, it goes off and everything is darker than ever and all you are left with is the.. BURN!
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Falling in love is easy. Falling in love with the same person repeatedly is extraordinary.

quotes.quote: Count your life by smiles, not tears. Count your age by friends, not years.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Today you are you! That is truer than true! There is no one alive who is you-er than you!
quotes.author: Dr. Seuss

quotes.quote: Birthdays are a new start, a fresh beginning, and a time to pursue new endeavors with new goals. Move forward with confidence and courage. You're a very special person. May today and all of your days be amazing!
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.quote: Age is merely the number of years the world has been enjoying you.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Don't count the years, make the years count.
quotes.author: George Meredith

quotes.quote: Wishing you a day filled with love, joy, and all of your favorite things. Happy birthday!
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Birthdays are a time to celebrate dreams, achievements, and the joy of life. May yours be memorable in every way!
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: On your birthday, I wish you abundant happiness and love. May all your dreams become a reality. Happy birthday!
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Today is the oldest you've ever been and the youngest you'll ever be again. Enjoy this day while it lasts.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Birthdays are nature's way of telling us to eat more cake.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: May your birthday be filled with laughter, joy, and heartfelt wishes. Happy birthday!
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Age is an issue of mind over matter. If you don't mind, it doesn't matter.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: It's your birthday! Live it up, laugh out loud, and have a blast. You deserve to have a good time.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Happy birthday! Wishing you a day filled with happiness and a year filled with joy.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: The more you praise and celebrate your life, the more there is in life to celebrate.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: Happy birthday to someone who is forever young!
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Age is not important unless you're a cheese.
quotes.author: Helen Hayes

quotes.quote: Birthdays are a great time to stop and appreciate gravity. Sure, it makes things sag as you get older, but it also keeps your cake from flying all over the room, so you don't have to chase it.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Happy birthday! May your Facebook wall be filled with messages from people you never talk to.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Growing old is mandatory, but growing up is optional.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.quote: Youth is the gift of nature, but age is a work of art.
quotes.author: Stanislaw Jerzy Lec

quotes.quote: Birthdays are good for you. Statistics show that people who have the most live the longest!
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Happy birthday! Remember, age gets better with wine.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: You don't get older, you get better.
quotes.author: Shirley Bassey

quotes.quote: Happy birthday! Here's to another year of laughing at our own jokes and keeping each other sane!
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Growing old is a privilege denied to many. Embrace it and celebrate every moment.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Happy birthday! Don't count the candles, count the memories.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Today you are the youngest you will ever be. Celebrate and enjoy each moment.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Happy birthday! May your day be as beautiful as you are.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: The happiness of your life depends upon the quality of your thoughts.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: Happiness is not something ready-made. It comes from your own actions.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: The greatest happiness you can have is knowing that you do not necessarily require happiness.

quotes.quote: The secret of happiness is not in doing what one likes, but in liking what one does.

quotes.quote: Happiness is a warm puppy.

quotes.quote: The true secret of happiness lies in the taking a genuine interest in all the details of daily life.
quotes.author: William Morris

quotes.quote: Happiness is a choice. You can choose to be happy. There's going to be stress in life, but it's your choice whether you let it affect you or not.

quotes.quote: The greatest happiness is to know the source of unhappiness.

quotes.quote: Happiness is when what you think, what you say, and what you do are in harmony.

quotes.quote: The best way to teach your kids about taxes is by eating 30% of their ice cream.
quotes.author: Bill Murray

quotes.quote: My fake plants died because I did not pretend to water them.

quotes.quote: I'm not superstitious, but I am a little stitious.

quotes.quote: The trouble with having an open mind, of course, is that people will insist on coming along and trying to put things in it.
quotes.author: Terry Pratchett

quotes.quote: I always arrive late at the office, but I make up for it by leaving early.
quotes.author: Charles Lamb

quotes.quote: I intend to live forever. So far, so good.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: I asked God for a bike, but I know God doesn't work that way. So I stole a bike and asked for forgiveness.
quotes.author: Emo Philips

quotes.quote: The only mystery in life is why the kamikaze pilots wore helmets.
quotes.author: Al McGuire

quotes.quote: The surest sign that intelligent life exists elsewhere in the universe is that it has never tried to contact us.
quotes.author: Bill Watterson

quotes.quote: I find television very educational. Every time someone turns it on, I go in the other room and read a book.
quotes.author: Groucho Marx

quotes.quote: A day without sunshine is like, you know, night.

quotes.quote: I'm not a vegetarian because I love animals. I'm a vegetarian because I hate plants.

quotes.quote: I don't need a hair stylist, my pillow gives me a new hairstyle every morning.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: I never make the same mistake twice. I make it five or six times, just to be sure.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: I tried to be normal once. Worst two minutes of my life.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: I told my wife she should embrace her mistakes. She gave me a hug.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: I'm not lazy, I'm just on energy-saving mode.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: If you can't convince them, confuse them.

quotes.quote: I don't need Google, my wife knows everything.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: I'm not clumsy. It's just that the floor hates me, the tables and chairs are bullies, and the walls get in my way.

quotes.quote: Behind every great man is a woman rolling her eyes.

quotes.quote: I don't go crazy. I am crazy. I just go normal from time to time.
